content.text: Templates let you save poll configurations for quick reuse. Perfect for recurring polls like weekly check-ins, team lunches, or feedback surveys.
After creating any poll, Askify sends you a DM with a 'Save as Template' button.

items: Create a poll using /askify
After the poll is created, check your DMs from Askify
Click the 'Save as Template' button
Enter a name for your template
Click Submit
Poll question
Poll type
All options (for single choice and multi-select)
All voting settings (anonymous, vote change, live results, reminders)
Close method (manual, duration, or date/time)
Poll description (if provided)

content.text: Templates do NOT save the target channel or scheduled time. You'll choose these when using the template.
Load a saved template when creating a new poll:

items: Run /askify templates
Find your template in the list
Click 'Use Template'
The poll creation modal opens with all fields pre-filled
Modify any fields if needed
Select target channel and create
Run /askify to open the creation modal
Look for the 'Load Template' dropdown at the bottom
Select a template from the dropdown
Modal fields update with template values
Modify and create as usual

content.text: View and delete templates using /askify templates:

items: Each template shows its name, poll type, and option count
Click 'Use Template' to create a poll from it
Click 'Delete' to remove a template permanently

content.text: Deleting a template does not affect any polls created from it. Only the template itself is removed.
